name: "The Caterpillar" 芋虫 Imo Mushi
description:
"The Caterpillar" is a dark story written in 1929 by edogawa ranpo
was originally banned due to it’s content and is regarded as one of the darkest and most controversial tales ever written by a japanese author.
about a veteran who was turned into a quadriplegic and so disfigured by war that he was little more than a human "caterpillar", unable to talk, move, or live by himself.
